extendedInfo.description: [Plasma Sound HD and Plasma Sound are now officially the same application. There is no difference whatsoever.]Plasma Sound is the most fully-featured and 100% free music instrument on the Android Marketplace!Beautiful music instrument inspired by the Theremin, Continuum, Keyboard and Sequencer.  Touch the screen and a note is generated.  It's X-Axis (left-to-right) is pitch, which is designated by note and octave markings.   It's Y-Axis (up-and-down) is up to you to control!  Plasma Sound is incredibly configurable. Pick the note range, the waveform, cutoff, delay, tremolo, vibrato and more!  You can even select between continuous mode (theremin-like), quantize mode (keyboard-like), and a hybrid.Plasma Sound applies the same principals to the Sequencer to give you even more music creation abilities!  Select a note to activate it, and drag up and down to select it's Y-value, controlling the same thing that the Y-Axis controls in the Keyboard section.  Immediately you get an incredibly dynamic and versatile sequencer.On Android 3.0 tablets and up, a new beta feature has been added: The ability to create and play sequences using the front-facing camera.  Select the "Motion" tab to try it out!Follow us on twitter for more release notes, questions, etc: http://twitter.com/plasmasoundThis app is known to have problems with older/lower end phones.  The original Droid is known to work (just barely), but phones with lower specs will most likely run in to problems.  Please don't leave a bad comment if your phone doesn't work; it's an intense app, intended for tablets (although an honest effort is put in to supporting older phones, I promise).The beautiful visual based off of MSAFluid, and the sound is generated by libpd.100% Ad and cost free!Please let me know of any bugs or errors you encounter!  In addition, if you have any feature requests, let me know.  Feel free to email me or post on the XDA thread here: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=17498254   This is my instrument for my band, Shy Guy Says, http://shyguysays.com (check us out!), so I'm incredibly concerned about stability and ease of use!The source for this program is at: https://github.com/rjmarsan/PlasmaSound

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: I love this simple but subtlety complex piece of audio engineering, my son(3 months ) and I .... Love it, its ace
reviews.author: andrew stott

reviews.title: Awesome and heaps of fun.
reviews.comment: Now if I was just a wee bit musical I could make some great music.  :-). Works great on A500
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I had low expectations.
reviews.comment: Boy,  I was wrong. This is a fantastic noise app. Responsive,  intuitive and highly tweakable. A standout in the weak Android market for music apps.
reviews.author: Jon Rogers

reviews.title: Fun, and unique
reviews.comment: I\'m really digging this app.   It is one of only a hand full of apps that I will always install,  or  reinstall whenever I change device .   Also the look,  feel,  and sound of it is superb on my tablet.   If you can make this app \"float\" on screen (tablet) so it could more easily be used along with my DJ app,  and drum kit , then this app will be as close to perfect as it could get.   Kudos on making it free,  and keep up the good work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Excellent and free.. Keyboard is great, hope to see it continue to be improved and polished. I would like to be able to limit notes by key, as it can be hard to get the right notes when you have more than a few octaves on the board and ends up sounding quite horrid then.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So much fun!
reviews.comment: I love this app! It has also provided tons of amusement for my cat. He has the best time with the colors and sounds.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A fun little program
reviews.comment: I am on the nexus7 . It works great.  Fun and entertaining for the kids. Doesn`t works on Toshiba thrive

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: Way better than Saucillator for Android.

reviews.title: Amazing app and its adfree!
reviews.comment: I m giving 5 stars even though I could not get the motion thing working.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: want to give 5 stars, but...
reviews.comment: I can\'t get the motion tab to work. I\'ve been using this app live for quite a while... it\'s my favorite... front-facing camera support seems too good to be true... have made adjustments to sensitivity but still no luck. Perhaps an email to the devs will sort this out. Thanks for all your work on this app... <3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: What an amazing app! I should be doing a ton of other stuff but I can\'t stop playing with Plasma HD. Works flawlessly on my Sony Tablet S.

reviews.title: Absolutely free, and No ads...
